title: Pixel 5 in-app/system sounds are too loud
content:
I've just upgraded from the Pixel 3 XL to Pixel 5 and realised the in-app or system sounds on the Pixel 5 are just way too loud.

These sounds include dial tones (see this video which compares P3XL - left with P5 - right), screenshot, Facebook like button, WhatsApp voice chats, etc.

Adjusting any of the volume settings do not solve this issue. Also, I'm on the 5 Nov 2020 update.

Is there anything I can do to solve this? Thanks!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
